coded.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: coded information uses a system of words, letters, or symbols instead of ordinary writing so that it can only be understood by someone else who knows the system
coded.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He sent a coded message to CIA headquarters.
coded.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: having a set of numbers, letters, or symbols to show what something is or give information about it
coded.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The wires are colour coded for easy identification.
coded.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: coded language expresses your opinion in an indirect way because it will probably offend someone
coded.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: They voiced their criticism in coded statements.
coded.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: coded sounds or signals can only be understood by special machines
coded.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: coded signals broadcast by the BBC radio transmitters
